Hi all, thoughts on the naming of ["PATH.jl"](<https://github.com/odow/PATH.jl>): <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/28646>

elements.text: Hi all, thoughts on the naming of ["PATH.jl"](

messages.text:
Hmm. I'm not a huge fan. I'd prefer something like PATHSolver.jl.

That being said, it's your package, so if you really want to keep this name, ping me in 3 days and I can merge it.

But I would recommend at least considering something more descriptive, like PATHSolver.jl.

elements.text: Hmm. I'm not a huge fan. I'd prefer something like PATHSolver.jl.
That being said, it's your package, so if you really want to keep this name, ping me in 3 days and I can merge it.
But I would recommend at least considering something more descriptive, like PATHSolver.jl.

messages.text:
I registered a package 6 hours ago (automerged), and when I run the `Pkg.add` command, still the previous version is added. How can I fix this?
<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/issues/28687>

I was told that "It takes some time for it to propagate to the servers.". How long exactly does it take for the package to arrive to my place?

elements.text: I registered a package 6 hours ago (automerged), and when I run the
Pkg.add
command, still the previous version is added. How can I fix this?
I was told that "It takes some time for it to propagate to the servers.". How long exactly does it take for the package to arrive to my place?

messages.text: It depends a bit on how busy the servers are.

elements.text: It depends a bit on how busy the servers are.

messages.text: Usually not this long so perhaps something is stuck.

elements.text: Usually not this long so perhaps something is stuck.

messages.text: The package is finally here! I should have used UPS Express to speed up the delivery.
